channel.title: foldable on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in foldable on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-21
item.description: Google’s foldable phone plans include two devices, Android 12.1 release (4 minute read) Google is rumored to be working on two foldable phones and incorporating foldable functionality into an out-of-cycle update to Android.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-04
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a foldable iPhone for 2023 (2 minute read) Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo says that Apple plans to launch an 8-inch foldable iPhone by 2023.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-07
item.description: Trump signs orders banning US business with TikTok owner ByteDance and Tencent’s WeChat (4 minute read) President Donald Trump has signed an executive order banning transactions with ByteDance and WeChat.
